article_title: Jersey gave us bridge backups and Snooki. Now it’s tobacco bonds
article_text:

twitter.title: Jersey gave us bridge backups and Snooki. Now it’s tobacco bonds
twitter.description: Scandals in New Jersey aren’t confined to bridge lane closings or politicians getting caught in videos agreeing to take pathetically small bribes. Let me show you a different kind of Jersey scand...

article_metadata.sailthru.title: Jersey gave us bridge backups and Snooki. Now it’s tobacco bonds
article_metadata.description: A brilliant bit of financing is good for some troubled tobacco bonds, but bad for taxpayers of the Garden State.
